price: 15. Verily, We shall remove the torment for a while. Verily you will revert (to disbelief).
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
